resources.string: Nicholas Katzakis based on Tobias Schwirten & Martin Kaltenbrunner\'s TUIOdroid

This application sends multitouch events via TUIO/UDP. You can change the target IP address and port number as well as the default screen orientation in the settings dialog. The TUIO verbosity can be increased for the use on unreliable networks. You will find further information about the TUIO protocol and framework at TUIO.org\n\nThe included Java TUIO implementation is based on the JavaOSC library by Chandrasekhar Ramakrishnan.
